Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.extensions

Class UiTestExtension

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.extensions.UiTestExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.Extension, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestExecutionExceptionHandler, org.junit.platform.launcher.LauncherSessionListener
public class UiTestExtension extends Object implements org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterTestExecutionCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestExecutionExceptionHandler, org.junit.platform.launcher.LauncherSessionListener
JUnit 5 test extension for managing UI-related test execution lifecycle.

This extension provides support for:

  • Intercepting UI-related HTTP requests using InterceptRequests.
  • Automating login via UI authentication using AuthenticateViaUi.
  • Capturing screenshots on test failures and optionally on passed tests.
  • Registering UI assertions and handling WebDriver session cleanup.
  • Intercepting backend requests in Chrome DevTools.

It integrates with SmartWebDriver for Selenium interactions and works with Quest for structured test execution.

Author:
